bug.author: reyoung
bug.summary: Test gradient of cos_sim_op could be failed
bug.description:
The error log is <denchmark-link:https://paddleci.ngrok.io/viewLog.html?buildId=8089&buildTypeId=Paddle_PrCi&tab=buildLog&_focus=4662>here</denchmark-link> . It seems that:
There might be some bugs when implementing cos_sim_op Or we should increase relative_error for cos_sim_op
